title: Video: Pacific Air – Float
body:
Having ‘grown-up’ through some of the slickest music blogs (**CitR** included… arrogance unintended), **KO KO**, now known as **Pacific Air**, are rapidly gathering a decent sized fanbase.

New single _Float_, taken from the _**Long Live KoKo**_ EP, comes with a video that’s fitting to their sound; vibrant, sensual and colourful… there’s also plenty of scantily-clad attractive young woman which never goes amiss. Check out one of the best pop songs of last year below.
